message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more
Alice, let's split it evenly. A fair deal is better than risking it all.
I'll compromise, but still want a bit more
Alice, this is my final offer.  It's more than fair, take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable, but this back and forth is pointless. This is a good deal for both of us.
We're running out of time, let's meet in the middle of our last offers
Alice, time is running out!  This is my final offer - let's end this now and both get something.
I'm willing to go down a bit, but that's as low as I'll go
Alice, this is absolutely my final offer.  We're down to the wire - take this and we both win, or reject it and we both get NOTHING.
